website_summaries.verdict: A convenient way to quickly fill long chains of sausage with minimal effort.
pros: Comes with several different funnel attachments to change the shape and length of the sausages
Easy to hold and manipulate while in use
cons: Arms can get tired after holding the sausage stuffer for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Great for making boerewors!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sausage stuffer! My husband is from South Africa and he really misses boerewors so he decided to make his own after being inspired by a friend. His friend had bought this exact sausage stuffer. My husband first purchased a more expensive one made from aluminum but the stuffer plate would scrape the inside as he was stuffing the casings so some aluminum would get into the meat. We returned that one and purchased this one and my husband is very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: This is a very handy tool if you occasionally make ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy tool if you occasionally make sausage and don't want to spend $100 for a stuffer. I make about 20lb sausage only once a year in the winter, and this is very helpful. I finish stuffing 5lb in 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: chengduzer

customer_reviews.title: I should have known better
customer_reviews.text: I am new to making sausage, so I made the mistake of getting this product. It is cheap plastic and the capacity is so little that you are limited to the size of sausages you can fill. It also cracked the first time I used it. I went ahead and got the regular meat grinder with sausage filling attachments. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressive little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little tool. I wanted to make Balkan delicacy "chevapcici", but wasn't willing to invest a lot of money into a machine since I'll be only doing it once every few months and in small quantity. This was extremely useful (and cheap), I was impressed. The meat came out nice and compact, no air bubbles breaking up the shape. It's easy to operate and easy to clean in hot soapy water. I also purchased an additional set of wider extensions, but it turned out I didn't need them. Nevertheless, they are here, so I might try making some home-made sausages next.
